SwitchPreference.android:title: Keep on
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Do not allow the screen to sleep while the app is open.

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Spatial Pixel Skip
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: Skip pixels along the long axis of the gut, to reduce resolution of the map's spatial axis.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Threshold Inversion
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If the gut is dark against a light background.

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Minimum Detection Width
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: The minimum pixel width of the gut for it to be detected.

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Gap Skip
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: The maximum gap of below-threshold pixels that can be ignored.

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Spine Smooth
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: The pixel size of the kernel used to smooth the spine. Make larger for radius maps.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Save On Close
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Automatically save a live recording when the app is closed.
